Forest Road

Label
Forest Road
Object type
Drawing
Genre
Landscape
Date
ca. 1605
Height
23.7
Width (cm)
36.9
Support
Pen in brown ink, brown wash, brown watercolor, red, green, yellow, black stone marks and some gouache
Drawing medium
36.9
Further inscription
Verso, "S P / A S hsh - C V O" (later hand)
Our attribution
Jan Brueghel the Elder
Other attribution authorities

Bailey/Walker
BRUS.MR.1
